message: Hi there! 👋 I'm Histronaut, your AI history tutor. Ask me anything about history or click one of the suggestions above to get started!

Hi there! 👋 I'm Yuhasa, your history tutor.  What historical topic are you interested in exploring today?  The textbook excerpts cover a wide range of subjects, from the Industrial Revolution to Sri Lankan history and major world wars. Let me know what sparks your curiosity!
